insert into product (cs_id, `date`, description, image, integral, is_hot, market_price, shop_price, title, image1, image2, image3, image4) values (#{csId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shopPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update product set cs_id = #{csId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_hot = #{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shop_price = #{shopPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image1 = #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image2 = #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image3 = #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image4 = #{image4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, cs_id, `date`, description, image, integral, is_hot, market_price, shop_price, title, image1, image2, image3, image4 from product where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
